title: Getting Dressed
text: Every morning, I get dressed for school. I put on my school uniform. It has a white shirt and blue pants. I wear black shoes. In winter, I also wear a warm jacket. Today it is cold, so I wear a scarf and gloves too. My favorite clothes are my jeans and my red T-shirt. I wear them on weekends. My sister loves dresses. She has many colorful dresses. What do you like to wear? I think comfort is the most important thing!
